name: Failed Trust
description:
Game name: "Failed Trust"

Description:

Welcome to "Failed Trust", a thrilling adventure that takes you through the labyrinthine corridors of a mysterious tech hub. No one explained why you were here, but you were tasked with picking up important documents. Immerse yourself in a world of technology and mystery as you try to unravel the unusual history of this place.

Gameplay:

The technical center that appears on your way hides unexplored areas and unique mechanisms. Your guide will be an energy accumulator that allows you to dive deep into the center. Collect energy from glowing lamps and energy shields to illuminate your path and open doors leading to new sections of the tech center.

Your adventure will be filled with unexpected finds, interesting mechanisms and puzzles necessary to move deeper into the center. Solve problems and uncover the secrets hidden in its intricate vaults.

Game Features:

- Expand the tech center: Explore the different sections of the center, discovering its structure and functionality.
- Energy Storage: Use a unique mechanism to collect energy and illuminate the spaces around you.
- Interactive Puzzles: Solve challenging puzzles to open up new paths and navigate challenging areas of the center.
- A mysterious story: Uncover the secrets of the tech center's past as you follow the flow of your tasks and goals.

Walk through the corridors, collect documents and unravel the mysteries of the "Failed Trust". Good luck on your journey through this mysterious place!
